y, Minime, whether NBM affects NBW was not Dechante's

p to the council and the the members of NBW, and

ffects NBM is up to Dechante and the members 
  of NBM.

  Sl=
ayer nods, following his master to get the suit. He glances at 
  Spears as=
 he passes her, shoving her roughly aside so he can get 
  through. He grow=
ls, looking at her as he passes, his red optics 
  settling back on Prebon =
as he turns his head away.

  "Who is that femm, Master?" he asks Prebon, a=
 surge of something 
  close to hatred going through him.

ed.

your

I am Starscream, former ruler of the Decepticons and member of the

est faction of Predacons, commanded under KitKat. Please hold on

inute while I contact my group and than we will go."

m:

  >=
 Oblitercons, but he's letting us use the Lavacons, a group that by

e looks of things is stronger than the Oblitercons. We are about 
  to

oticed that the firing had stopped. It was either they gave

ng or are entering the mountain. It would be foolish to

better think the foolish thing when dealing with fools.

u three, stay in the back and wipe away our tracks. When

rebon frowned.

ing you knew

s of our enemy

.

 =
 of 
  > your friend...." Than Prebon eralized something. He needed to stop=

  e=
ven

 =
 > curious, he might sneak away to the Maximals. They would reveal his

 old personality and when tell all Trainer secrets.

ears, I really have no mission right now. Soon

le. We will gang up on Ramulus and kill him. Right

 come with me. I want you try on a War Suit that
